title: WorkerInterceptor not invoked for methods returning a Multi

labels.name: triage/wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
### Describe the bug

When defining a JAX-RS WriterInterceptor with quarkus-resteasy-reactive, the WriterInterceptor is only invoked for blocking methods and those returning a Uni<?>, but not for methods returning a Multi<?>.

### Expected behavior

The WriterInterceptor should be invoked for all methods, including those returning a Multi<?>

### Actual behavior

WriterInterceptor is only invoked for blocking methods and those returning a Uni<?>, but not for methods returning a Multi<?>.

### How to Reproduce?

See attached sample app

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Mac OS 12.2.1, arm64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.14" 2022-01-18 LTS
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 11.0.14+9-LTS)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 11.0.14+9-LTS, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

n/a

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.7.3

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven 3.8.4

### Additional information

_No response_
